help.short: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally.
Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally.
Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.
Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally
Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.
ID of the Azure DNS zone.
Key-Value pair representing migration properties for domains.
The host name of the domain. Must be a domain name.
Resource reference to the Azure resource where custom domain ownership was prevalidated
Resource ID.
Resource reference to the secret. ie. subs/rg/profile/secret

command.name: update

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$customDomain.properties.tlsSettings.customizedCipherSuiteSet.cipherSuiteSetForTls12" options="cipher-suite-set-for-tls12">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$customDomain.properties.tlsSettings.customizedCipherSuiteSet.cipherSuiteSetForTls13" options="cipher-suite-set-for-tls13">
